Package com.sicomsa.dmt.svc

Class VerificaSvc

java.lang.Object
com.sicomsa.dmt.svc.AbstractSvc<P,Q>
com.sicomsa.dmt.svc.AbstractGenericSvc<VerificaResponse,String>
com.sicomsa.dmt.svc.VerificaSvc
All Implemented Interfaces:
Service<VerificaResponse,String>
public class VerificaSvc extends AbstractGenericSvc<VerificaResponse,String>
Extends AbstractGenericSvc to provide a concrete implementation of the WS defined for verifying download requests:
"https://cfdidescargamasivasolicitud.clouda.sat.gob.mx/VerificaSolicitudDescargaService.svc"

This class has concrete methods to create a download verification request; sign, and send it to the web service. Then parse the response to provide a VerificaResponse with methods to query the response.

User can test the state of the response to see if it was accepted, or if the verification is done, or not yet done.

When the verification of the download request is accepted and finished, then you can use VerificaResponse to obtain the package ids that are now needed to download.

, service to download from the web service after verification.
Since:
1.0
Version:
2025.01.04
Author:
Beto Lopez
